snap(200,200,200)

sky(128,128,128)
fog(255,255,255)
ground(255,255,255)
polys(243,243,243)

fadefrom(5000)
density(4)

name(Is The Snowstorm Gone?)
nlaps(3)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(10,0,11200,180)p
set(31,0,17309,0)p
set(10,0,21789,180)p

set(10,0,32989,0)p

set(37,-26900,-7200,90)
